languages.text: {n}Двое в ритуальных робах громко переговариваются между собой. Старый священник с аппетитом ест, священник помоложе с отвращением наблюдает за трапезой.{/n} "То, что вы себе позволяете, это лицемерие! Настоящий служитель предпочел бы излишествам аскезу".

{n}The two men in clergy robes are bickering loudly. The older of the pair is eating with great appetite, while the younger one watches him in disgust.{/n} "Your overindulgence is pure hypocrisy! A true servant of the faith would have abstained."
languages.original_text: {n}Двое в ритуальных робах громко переговариваются между собой. Старый священник с аппетитом ест, священник помоложе с отвращением наблюдает за трапезой.{/n} "То, что вы себе позволяете, это лицемерие! Настоящий служитель предпочел бы излишествам аскезу".

traits.locale_text: {n}The two men in clergy robes are bickering loudly. The old priest is eating with great appetite, while the younger one watches him in disgust.{/n} "Your overindulgence is pure hypocrisy! A true servant of the faith would have abstained. Come to think of it, I do not recall ever seeing you at the temple in the rich quarters..."

{n}The two men in clergy robes are bickering loudly. The old priest is eating with great appetite, while the younger one watches him in disgust.{/n} "Your overindulgence is pure hypocrisy! A true servant of the faith would have abstained. Come to think of it, I do not recall ever seeing you at the temple in the rich quarters..."

{n}The two men in clergy robes are bickering loudly. The older of the pair is eating with great appetite, while the younger one watches him in disgust.{/n} "Your overindulgence is pure hypocrisy! A true servant of the faith would have abstained. Come to think of it, I do not recall ever seeing you at the temple in the rich quarters..."

A true servant of the faith would have abstained. Come to think of it, I do not recall ever seeing you at the temple in the rich quarters..."

A true servant of the faith would have abstained. Come to think of it, I do not recall ever seeing you at the temple in the rich quarters..."

{n}The two men in clergy robes are bickering loudly. The older of the pair is eating with great appetite, while the younger one watches him in disgust.{/n} "Your overindulgence is pure hypocrisy! A true servant of the faith would have abstained."

languages.text: {n}两个身穿牧师长袍的人正在大声争吵。年迈的牧师正在大快朵颐，而年轻的牧师一脸厌弃地看着他。{/n}“你如此放纵欲望，你的布道实在是虚伪不堪！神皇真正的仆人应当克制自己的欲望。”
languages.original_text: {n}The two men in clergy robes are bickering loudly. The older of the pair is eating with great appetite, while the younger one watches him in disgust.{/n} "Your overindulgence is pure hypocrisy! A true servant of the faith would have abstained."

traits.locale_text: {n}两个身穿牧师长袍的人正在大声争吵。年迈的牧师正在大快朵颐，而年轻的牧师一脸厌弃地看着他。{/n}“你如此放纵欲望，你的布道实在是虚伪不堪！神皇真正的仆人应当克制自己的欲望。话说回来，我好像从来没在贵族区的神殿里见过你……”

languages.text: {n}聖職者の衣をまとった二人の男が大声で言い争っていた。年上の方は旺盛な食欲で食べ続けており、若い方はそれを嫌悪の眼差しで見つめていた。{/n}「お前のその貪欲さは、まさに偽善そのものだ！信仰に仕える真の者なら、慎むはずだ。」
languages.original_text: {n}The two men in clergy robes are bickering loudly. The older of the pair is eating with great appetite, while the younger one watches him in disgust.{/n} "Your overindulgence is pure hypocrisy! A true servant of the faith would have abstained."

traits.locale_text: {n}聖職者の衣をまとった二人の男が大声で言い争っていた。年上の方は旺盛な食欲で食べ続けており、若い方はそれを嫌悪の眼差しで見つめていた。{/n}「お前のその貪欲さは、まさに偽善そのものだ！信仰に仕える真の者なら、慎むはずだ。そういえば、お前が上層区の寺院に来ているのを見た覚えがないな…」

languages.text: {n}Los dos hombres con hábitos eclesiásticos discuten airadamente. El más viejo está comiendo con bastante apetito mientras el joven lo observa con cara de asco.{/n} «¡Su exceso de gula es una hipocresía! Un verdadero siervo de la fe se comportaría con frugalidad».
languages.original_text: {n}The two men in clergy robes are bickering loudly. The older of the pair is eating with great appetite, while the younger one watches him in disgust.{/n} "Your overindulgence is pure hypocrisy! A true servant of the faith would have abstained."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los dos hombres con hábitos eclesiásticos discuten airadamente. El más viejo está comiendo con bastante apetito mientras el joven lo observa con cara de asco.{/n} «¡Su exceso de gula es una hipocresía! Un verdadero siervo de la fe se comportaría con frugalidad. Ahora que lo pienso, no recuerdo haberlo visto una sola vez en el templo del barrio de los ricos...».

languages.text: {n}Din görevlisi cübbesi giymiş iki adam, yüksek sesle atışıyor. Yaşça büyük olan iştahla yemek yerken küçük olan onu tiksintiyle izliyor.{/n} "Oburluğun tam bir ikiyüzlülük! İnancın gerçek bir hizmetkârı, nefsini tutardı."
languages.original_text: {n}The two men in clergy robes are bickering loudly. The older of the pair is eating with great appetite, while the younger one watches him in disgust.{/n} "Your overindulgence is pure hypocrisy! A true servant of the faith would have abstained."

traits.locale_text: {n}Din görevlisi cübbesi giymiş iki adam, yüksek sesle atışıyor. Yaşça büyük olan iştahla yemek yerken küçük olan onu tiksintiyle izliyor.{/n} "Oburluğun tam bir ikiyüzlülük! İnancın gerçek bir hizmetkârı, nefsini tutardı. Hem düşününce seni zengin mahallelerindeki tapınakta gördüğümü hatırlamıyorum..."

languages.text: {n}Les deux hommes en robes cléricales se disputent bruyamment. Le plus vieux des deux mange avec un solide appétit, tandis que le plus jeune le regarde avec dégoût.{/n} « Votre gloutonnerie relève de la pure hypocrisie ! Un véritable serviteur de la foi aurait jeûné. »
languages.original_text: {n}The two men in clergy robes are bickering loudly. The older of the pair is eating with great appetite, while the younger one watches him in disgust.{/n} "Your overindulgence is pure hypocrisy! A true servant of the faith would have abstained."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les deux hommes en robes cléricales se disputent bruyamment. Le plus vieux des deux mange avec un solide appétit, tandis que le plus jeune le regarde avec dégoût.{/n} « Votre gloutonnerie relève de la pure hypocrisie ! Un véritable serviteur de la foi aurait jeûné. Maintenant que j'y pense, je n'ai pas souvenir de vous avoir vu dans le temple des beaux quartiers... »

languages.text: {n}Die zwei Männer in Priesterroben streiten lautstark. Der Ältere isst mit großem Appetit, während der Jüngere ihm angewidert zusieht.{/n} "Eure Völlerei ist pure Heuchelei! Ein wahrer Diener des Glaubens wäre abstinent geblieben."
languages.original_text: {n}The two men in clergy robes are bickering loudly. The older of the pair is eating with great appetite, while the younger one watches him in disgust.{/n} "Your overindulgence is pure hypocrisy! A true servant of the faith would have abstained."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die zwei Männer in Priesterroben streiten lautstark. Der Ältere isst mit großem Appetit, während der Jüngere ihm angewidert zusieht.{/n} "Eure Völlerei ist pure Heuchelei! Ein wahrer Diener des Glaubens wäre abstinent geblieben. Wenn ich's recht bedenke, habe ich Euch niemals im Tempel in den Reichenvierteln gesehen ..."
